extendedInfo.description: A stock app that provides easy access to a variety of quotes, charts and news for US stock, ETF and mutual funds1. Excel style portfolio view for quote data, price, P/E, PEG2. Allow user defined math formula implement stock pick strategy3. Continuous quote update from Yahoo Finance4. Various technical charts from Yahoo, FinViz, MorningStar, StockTA and StockCharts5. Position management by ticker or portfolioDon't forget leaving your feedback in comments and +1 the appTry this winning formula as stock screener to catch the next bull: ${P/E}>0&${EPS(ttm)}>0&(${EPS(next Y)-${EPS(this Y)})*100>${P/E}*${EPS(ttm)}

reviews.title: The most snappy stock app ever!
reviews.comment: After tried so many stock apps, I\'m pretty sure this one is the fastest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: Very useful and flexible. Being able to make your own formula based fields is pretty great as I can put my projected sell value keying in the operator\'s fee as a percentage of the actual price for example.
reviews.author: Cristian Marcio

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: They have information on stocks and I find the analysis tool useful. Example is the support and resistance are listed in the analysis, you can use this information to put a stop loss.
reviews.author: Nafiz Ahamed

reviews.title: Easy to use stock tracking app
reviews.author: Zuoxian Hu

reviews.title: Best I\'ve seen
reviews.comment: Very comprehensive access to charts and a very smooth ui I love it
reviews.author: CBStock Fritz

reviews.title: Eccentric
reviews.comment: A practical market app for today\'s market.
reviews.author: David Lee

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: This app is very fast and responsive. UI is very simple and easy to learn. The analysis and charts are nicely arranged however in depth analysis and custom chart views are best done on a desktop rather than a tablet. No custom text font but a great app for on the go.
reviews.author: Eric Wissenbach

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I lnstalled this app. works great for me. The only suggestion will be to be able to hide the top bar once chart is displayed. other that that, I love this app.
reviews.author: Cristobal Ulloa

reviews.title: Totally sucks
reviews.comment: Have fun trying to \'remove a portfolio\'. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great job! Thanks
reviews.comment: I like features like configurable table display, auto data update and technical analysis, which are missing in yahoo finance app. Keep up nice work !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: it rocks
reviews.comment: A big surprise. Best stock watch software I have used. It is so flexible and functional! Love it, definitely recommend to my friends!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: way to go
reviews.comment: need to sync with Google finance and add more features. htc evo 2.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs fixing
reviews.comment: Can\'t input number of shares bought, price bought and morningstar report does not work for qqq for some reason...once fixed I\'m keen to re-install it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ALMOST my goto technical analysis chart app
reviews.comment: I love the different chart feeds available and the simple interface. I only wish the charts were a little more user definable. This app gives the best technicals and lots of fundamentals and I use it nearly every day.
reviews.author: Matt M
